bibl.title: Europe, Hellas and Egypt: Complementary Antipodes during Late Antiquity. Papers from Session IV.3, Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Eighth Annual Meeting in Thessaloniki 2002. (BAR International Series. 1218.)
bibl.note: figg., 1 carte, pll. n./bl., 7 pll. coul.
9 communications. - Pp. iii: Ashraf-Alexandre SADEK, Foreword; - v-viii: Amanda-Alice MARAVELIA and Galina A. BELOVA, Introduction.

MARAVELIA Amanda-Alice (Ed.), Europe, Hellas and Egypt: Complementary Antipodes during Late Antiquity. Papers from Session IV.3, Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Eighth Annual Meeting in Thessaloniki 2002. (BAR International Series. 1218.)
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2004, 4°, ix-98 pp., figg., 1 carte, pll. n./bl., 7 pll. coul. ISBN 1-84171-578-6. £35.
